channel.title: political economy on Owen F. Davis
channel.description: Recent content in political economy on Owen F. Davis

item.title: Money Parables (Phenomenal World)
item.description: Market societies use narratives to justify the social technology of money. Three money parables stand out: credit money, commodity money and chartalism.

item.title: The Next Shareholder Revolution
item.description: This report analyzes the history of social reformers interested in using financial technologies and institutions for egalitarian ends.

item.title: All Roads Lead To Wall Street (Dissent)
item.description: This article explores the financialization of protest and social movements: the use of shareholder activism to achieve egalitarian ends.
